content: As an AI language model, I do not have knowledge of current events or recent developments. However, in general, it is common for the Speaker of the House in Georgia to face challenges in getting their budget proposals passed by either the appropriations committee or the full House of Representatives. This is because the budgeting process is a complex and often contentious process that involves many competing priorities and interests. In some cases, the Speaker may need to negotiate with other legislative leaders or the Governor's office to reach a compromise on the budget. Additionally, the Speaker may face opposition from members of their own party or the minority party in the House who have different priorities or views on budget issues. However, the Speaker's influence and leadership role can often help to sway opinions and build support for the budget proposals they advocate for.
